conbody.p: This is an introductin to the DITA profiling/conditional text feature

Profiling conditions can both within topics and in maps. When set in a topic, they you to suppress an element (such as paragraph), step in a procedure, item in a list, or even a phrase within a sentence.
When set in a map, they allow you to suppress an entire topic or group of topics.
When set in a map, they allow you to create a variety of publications from a single map by applying profiling conditions to the build.
